name: Bernadette and the Demon Circus (Prototype)
description:
Bernadette awoke in a mental hospital, strangely completely alone. Walking it she begins to find herself inside a circus of horrors. Only Lucce, a magical luminous rabbit can save her from this nightmare.

This is a prototype version. If you enjoyed the game, please let me know! Maybe I can work on a full version.

For more games please visit: https://www.indigoarts.net
